answers.answer: Wait.... Am i allowed to drink water? I didn't even ask :(
Yes you just can't have anything with sugar because that will affect the test but you can have water
Oh okay thank you! That made me happy!
Just fast. Don't try any tips or tricks to pass it. You really want to know if you have gestational diabetes so that you can take care of yourself for your baby's sake.
U can even eat just like the other poster said no sugar lol
yeah my paper says you can have a light meal
I just worry a lot, I was diagnosed hypoglycemic when i was just a baby, so i worry that i will get sick without eating. Water is okay though?

Yea water is just fine and u can even eat toast or eggs in the morning just stay away from things with sugar the morning of mine I had eggs toast and milk and it came back 100% normal it'll even make it easier to hold down the drink and lower the chances of u getting sick
I wasn't allowed to eat anything and was only allowed sips of water here and there. And i got a perfect reading and got the all clear x
